comment: Most helpful professor I have had in all my years at Kennesaw.  Excellent teacher who really loves to teach and his students.

Dr. Lester is great. He is an excellent teacher with years of classroom as well as research experience. He is extremely helpful and looks to mentor and be a resource for his students. Very relaxed and easy going. If you're in TESOL, I suggest you take as many classes with him as possible.
